text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The battery life is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the HIDevolution MSI GE63 8SE Raider RGB 15.6" FHD 144Hz Gaming Laptop | 2.2 GHz i7-8750H, RTX 2060, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, PCIe 256GB SSD + 1TB HDD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 in the HIDevolution MSI GE63 8SE Raider RGB 15.6" FHD 144Hz Gaming Laptop | 2.2 GHz i7-8750H, RTX 2060, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, PCIe 256GB SSD + 1TB HDD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
